_header: Jesu Christ have mercy on me
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: A Prayer to Jesus — three couplets

Lincoln91.Transcription:
Ihesu criste haue mercy one meAls þu erte kynge of
                    magesteAnd forgiffe me my synnes allÞat I hafe donne bathe grete
                    and smallAnd brynge me if it be thi willTill heuene to wonne ay with
                    þe styll Ame
Lincoln91.Note:
Follows 6265 and
                    precedes ‘A sermon þat Dan John Gaytrye made’.
